ygData.subject: Some Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: I recently aquired the level 20 on my monk.  I have some questions. 1)  I managed to buy some Cured Silk Armor for a relativily low price.  So my choice is
ygData.messageBody:
I recently aquired the level 20 on my monk. I have
some questions.

1) I managed to buy some Cured Silk Armor for a
relativily low price. So my choice is between Cured
Silk Gi or Foreman's tunic. Any input?

2) Where is a good place for a level 20 to hunt.
From 14-17 I hunted oasis and from 17-20 I hunted East
Karana. Any recomendations?

3) Anyone know a good surname for a Monk named
Hammeron


Hammeron
Monk of Quellious
